These forms are very complicated for auto-zoning with component but at the same time you can create your own grasshopper definition to split the zones fairly easily.

In any case are really suggest to change curved surfaces to planar surfaces. If you run the analysis for these geometries it will take very long and it won't make a real difference in the results.
